00055 public function setNoOfDesiredMessagesPerPage($no_of_desired_messages_per_page)
00056 {

00070 private function getNumberofOriginalComments()
00071 {
00072    foreach($this->objOriginalComments as $thisComment)
00073            {
00074    $id = $thisComment["id"];
00075    $userid = $thisComment["userid"];
00076    $title = $thisComment["title"];
00077    $commenttxtshort = $thisComment["commenttxtshort"];
00078    $comments = $thisComment["commenttxt"];
00079    $modified = $thisComment["modified"];
00080    $unreplied = $thisComment["unreplied"];
00081    $no_of_replies = $thisComment["replies"];
00082 
00083 if (($no_of_replies ==0 & $unreplied == true)||($no_of_replies>0 & $unreplied == FALSE))
00084     {
00085 $this->no_of_elements++;
00086 
00087 
00088     }
00089   }
00090 
00091  return  $this->no_of_elements ;
00092 }

00107 private function searchMessages($search_value)
00108 {
00109   return $this->objOriginalComments =  $this->objDBOriginalComments->searchOriginalMessages($search_value,$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00110 }
00111 public function sortMessages($type_of_sort)
00112 {
00113 
00114 switch ($type_of_sort)
00115         {
00116 
00117             case 'sortAuthorsAscendingOrder': return $this->objOriginalComments =  $this->objDBOriginalComments->sortByAuthorAtoZ($this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00118             break;
00119             case 'sortAuthorsDescendingOrder': return $this->objOriginalComments =  $this->objDBOriginalComments->sortByAuthorZtoA($this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00120             break;
00121             case 'sortSubjectMatterAscendingOrder': return $this->objOriginalComments =  $this->objDBOriginalComments->sortBySubjectMatterAtoZ($this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page );
00122             break;
00123             case 'sortSubjectMatterDescendingOrder': return $this->objOriginalComments =  $this->objDBOriginalComments->sortBySubjectMatterZtoA($this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00124             break;
00125             case 'sortByLatestModifiedMessages': return $this->objOriginalComments =  $this->objDBOriginalComments->sortByLatestModified($this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00126             break;
00127             case 'sortByOldestModifiedMessages': return $this->objOriginalComments =  $this->objDBOriginalComments->sortByOldestModified($this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00128             break;
00129             case 'sortByMostReplies': return $this->objOriginalComments =  $this->objDBOriginalComments->sortByMostReplies($this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00130             break;
00131             case 'sortByLeastReplies': return $this->objOriginalComments =  $this->objDBOriginalComments->sortByLeastReplies($this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00132             break;
00133 
00134             default:
00135                 return $this->objOriginalComments = $this->objDBOriginalComments->sortByLatestModified($this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00136             break;
00137                // $this->clickedAdd=$this->getParam('clickedadd');
00138 
00139                 //return "home_tpl.php";
00140         }

00142 private function getPaginationParameters()
00143 {
00144     $searchBoolean = $this->getParam('searchBoolean');
00145 
00146   if ($searchBoolean==TRUE)
00147       {
00148 $searchValue = $this->getParam('searchValue');
00149 $this->getNumberofSearchedComments($searchValue);
00150   }
00151   else
00152   {
00153 
00154 
00155   $this->getNumberofOriginalComments();
00156   }
00157 
00158 $this->last_page_boolean_value = $this->no_of_elements%$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page;
00159 $this->number_of_pages = $this->no_of_elements/$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page;
00160 //$this->number_of_pages = ceil($this->number_of_pages);
00161      $this->page_number_array = array();
00162 // $this->page_number_array[]= $this->number_of_pages;
00163      for ($x=0;$x<=$this->number_of_pages;$x++)
00164      {
00165 if ($x == $this->number_of_pages || ($x==0 & $this->number_of_pages== 0))
00166     {
00167     if ($this->last_page_boolean_value > 0)
00168         {
00169     $this->page_number_array[]= $x;
00170     break;
00171         }
00172     break;
00173     }
00174 
00175     else
00176         {
00177      $this->page_number_array[]=$x;
00178         }
00179      }

00488  private function getFormAction()
00489  {
00490 
00491        $action = $this->getParam("action", "add");
00492   if ($action == "edit")
00493       {
00494    //Get the comment id and pass to uri
00495    $id = $this->getParam("id");
00496    //$replies = $this->getParam("replies");
00497    $formAction = $this->uri(array("action" => "update", "id"=>$id), "hosportal" );
00498   }
00499 
00500   if ($action == "reply")
00501       {
00502          $id = $this->getParam("id");
00503    $formAction = $this->uri(array("action" => "reply","id"=>$id), "hosportal");
00504   }
00505   if ($action == "add")
00506       {
00507 
00508 
00509   $formAction = $this->uri(array("action" => "add"), "hosportal");
00510 
00511 
00512       }
00513 
00514 
00515   return $formAction;
00516  
00517  }

00519  {
